## Load packages

```{r}

if (!require(pacman))
  install.packages("pacman")

pacman::p_load(camcorder,
               #gchismtt,
               glue,
               ggtext,
               patchwork,
               showtext,
               tidyverse
               )

```

## Load data

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(date_chr)

```

## Load fonts

## Start recording

```{r}
#| eval: false
gg_record(
  dir = file.path(yr, date_chr, "recording"),
  device = "png",
  width = 7,
  height = 5,
  units = "in",
  dpi = 300
)
```

## Define text

```{r}

  bg_colour = bg_col,
  icon_colour = highlight_col,
  font_colour = text_col,
  font_family = "roboto"
)
title <- ""  # Add your title here
```
